token-lean.Limit.Name: Maximum lean distance
token-lean.Limit.Hint: How many squares a token can lean. Works best between 0 and 0.5. Default: 0.25 (1/4 into the next square).
token-lean.Keybind.Name: Lean
token-lean.Keybind.Hint: Press to move your vision towards the mouse cursor.
token-lean.LegacyMode.Name: Disable live updates (Legacy Mode)
token-lean.LegacyMode.Hint: Use the old method of calculating vision position. This may increase compatability with some modules that rely on token position to render visual changes.
token-lean.Combat.Name: Allow leaning in combat
token-lean.Smoothing.Name: Control distance (client)
token-lean.Smoothing.Hint: A larger value allows for smoother control. Default: 1
token-lean.VisualTravel.Name: Token image travel
token-lean.VisualTravel.Hint: The distance a token appears to travel to other players.
